item.title: HowTo Install Redmine
item.description: Runtime environment CentOS 6.x Redmine 3.3.2 Ruby 2.2.6 rails 4.

item.title: Howto Install Redmine on Ubuntu 16.04
item.description: # base apt install mysql-server libmysqlclient-dev git-core subversion imagemagick libmagickwand-dev libcurl4-openssl-dev apt install build-essential mysql-server ruby ruby-dev libmysqlclient-dev imagemagick libmagickwand-dev # install mysql systemctl enable mysql.
